div.head: Dual Approach
div.p: The VICAV website is designed in a manner supposed to allow users to investigate the available resources through various methods. The basic access mode is to launch a query by clicking on the symbols on the map.

There are two distinct symbols: arrows and circles. The arrows indicate particular locations (towns, parts of towns, villages), the circles are used for regions that can but do not necessarily correlate with countries.
However, most queries can also be triggered by clicking on menu items or by formulating explicit queries.
